Content:
I have 85 honda 650 nighthawk (with carbs)

The engine runs strong but a compression check reads low.
I know when checking compression you should warm up the engine and hold the throttle wide open (which I did) however since I have cv carbs, the slide will be a restriction. Will this make a difference?
